name: The 9th Combinatorics and Graph Theory Conference
content: The 9th Combinatorics and Graph Theory Conference (CGT 2024) will be held in Kunming, China, during May 28-30, 2024\. The aim of CGT is to provide a stage for researchers, engineers, academicians as well as industrial professionals from all over the world to present their research results and development activities in Algebraic graph theory, Applications of combinatorics and graph theory, Coding theory, Combinatorial algorithms, Combinatorial designs, Combinatorial matrix theory, Combinatorial optimization, Cryptography, Enumerative combinatorics, Finite geometry, Structure graph theory, Topological graph theory, etc. CGT 2024 will be a valuable and important platform for inspiring international and interdisciplinary exchange at the forefront of Combinatorics and Graph Theory.
